name: A Way of Hero 1
description: During an apocalypse caused by an unknown virus, the Revenant Militia attempts to occupy an apparently uninfected village. They decide to raid all the food supplies and set fire to all the inhabitants and all the houses as a sign of power. You play as Fredrik Karlsen. A 22-year-old Norwegian boy who finds himself enlisting in the army because of mandatory mass conscription. However, his time and sacrifice will not be in vain. In fact, he will find himself killing militia. From him, the boy he was, a hero will be born for the nation of Val Verde.
